actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the period of a nationwide pandemic is a special enrollment period under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ensuring FEHBP Coverage During Pandemic Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Ensuring FEHBP Coverage During Pandemic Act

This bill allows federal employees to enroll in, or change enrollment under, the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program during a nationwide pandemic (as determined by the Office of Personnel Management).

titles.title: Ensuring FEHBP Coverage During Pandemic Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the period of a nationwide pandemic is a special enrollment period under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program, and for other purposes.
